headline: S&P Global Redefines Financial Insights with New AI-Powered Multi-Document Research and Analysis Tool in Capital IQ Pro ChatIQ
summary: S&P Global today announced new AI-powered enhancements to its flagship S&P Capital IQ Pro platform, introducing Document Intelligence 2.0 and several breakthrough features designed to accelerate financial analysis and deliver comprehensive insights with transparency. These enhancements represent a significant advancement in financial intelligence technology, addressing the growing demand for tools that deliver faster, more actionable intelligence in an increasingly complex global economy.
